oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Publicity preparations, circa 1951 December 07
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of Mrs. Ned Lentz, publicity chairman for the Fannie Battle Carolers, and Mrs. David Huggins, Jr. seen at the Nashville Banner newspaper building in 1951 during their publicity preparations for the Fannie Battle Social Workers' annual Christmas project to bring the Christmas Eve carolers into the homes of Nashville and Davidson County. This photograph illustrated the newspaper article "B. Banner Gets Christmas Spirit with Carol Committee," published in the 7 December 1951 issue of the Nashville Banner. Forms part of the Fannie Battle Day Home Records. 1 photograph : b & w ; 6.25 x 10 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lentz, Ned, Mrs.; Huggins, David, Mrs.
